name: Adder-Staff Boggart
oracle_text: When Adder-Staff Boggart enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Adder-Staff Boggart. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Aethersnipe
oracle_text:
When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Amoeboid Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{T}: Target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.
{T}: Target creature loses all creature types until end of turn.

name: Aquitect's Will
oracle_text: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.
flavor_text: There is nowhere on Lorwyn that the Merrow Lanes cannot go.

name: Avian Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Flying
flavor_text: Today it flies with the flock. Tomorrow it may wake to find them gone, its body in an unfamiliar form.

name: Axegrinder Giant
flavor_text: The angriest of giants are often the most skillful weaponsmiths. Their grudges fuel endless sessions at the forge, all the while growling ferociously to themselves.

name: Battlewand Oak
oracle_text:
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a Treefolk spell, Battlewand Oak gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Black Poplar Shaman
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Regenerate target Treefolk.
flavor_text: It absorbs the pain of other treefolk, which leaves it bitter, yet addicted to the sensation of agony.

name: Blades of Velis Vel
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

name: Blind-Spot Giant
oracle_text: Blind-Spot Giant can't attack or block unless you control another Giant.
flavor_text: Among the solitude-loving giantkind, teamwork is unusual. But he appreciates hearing the occasional "Swing down and to your left."

name: Boggart Birth Rite
oracle_text: Return target Goblin card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Auntie excitedly held up the squalling newborn. "This one looks like Byoog! Maybe he'll tell us what he saw and felt in the beyond."

name: Boggart Forager
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Boggart Forager: Target player shuffles their library.
flavor_text:
"Reach in this hole, lose a hand. Reach in that hole, find a sparkly."
—Auntie wisdom

name: Boggart Loggers
oracle_text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Boggart Loggers: Destroy target Treefolk or Forest.
flavor_text: Auntie Flint lent axes to Nibb and Gyik, thinking they'd share their experiences with her. She's still waiting for them to come back.

name: Boggart Sprite-Chaser
oracle_text: As long as you control a Faerie, Boggart Sprite-Chaser gets +1/+1 and has flying.
flavor_text:
"Auntie pointed out to the faerie how much mischief a flying boggart could wreak, and a beautiful new friendship was born."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Bog Hoodlums
oracle_text:
Bog Hoodlums can't block.
When Bog Hoodlums enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Hoodlums. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Bog-Strider Ash
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Whenever a player casts a Goblin spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "If you want to test wisdom, offer it to fools and watch how they tear it up."

name: Broken Ambitions
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that spell's controller mills four cards. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Caterwauling Boggart
oracle_text: Goblins you control and Elementals you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"As far as I can tell, that frog dangling from the stick serves absolutely no purpose whatsoever."
—Gaddock Teeg

name: Cenn's Heir
oracle_text: Whenever Cenn's Heir attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kithkin.
flavor_text: His home clachan's familial spirit bolsters his own, but he will be ready to preside over the town as cenn only after he learns to project that strength to others.

name: Cloudcrown Oak
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Clever folk build their homes near cloudcrowns. If a hawk or even just a faerie tries to swoop in, it'll get swatted from here to Cloverdell."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

name: Consuming Bonfire
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Consuming Bonfire deals 4 damage to target non-Elemental creature.
• Consuming Bonfire deals 7 damage to target Treefolk creature.
flavor_text:
"The elves use treefolk to drive us away. It is time to remove their tools."
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

name: Dawnfluke
oracle_text:
Flash
When Dawnfluke enters the battlefield, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Evoke {W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Deeptread Merrow
oracle_text: {U}: Deeptread Merrow gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: "My success at navigating the Dark Meanders irritates the Inkfathom school. They consider themselves peerless divers, but I try to remind them that they cannot own commodities like bravery and cunning."

name: Dreamspoiler Witches
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: At night, the faeries steal dreamstuff for their queen. At daybreak, countless creatures wake weak and hollow.

name: Elvish Branchbender
oracle_text: {T}: Until end of turn, target Forest becomes an X/X Treefolk creature in addition to its other types, where X is the number of Elves you control.
flavor_text: "How do the vinebred feel? Fah! We do not ask the puppet how it feels when the puppeteer bids it dance."

name: Elvish Eulogist
oracle_text: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

name: Elvish Handservant
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a Giant spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Handservant.
flavor_text: The hardest lesson for any elf to learn is humility. It takes a giant to teach that.

name: Exiled Boggart
oracle_text: When Exiled Boggart dies, discard a card.
flavor_text: Among the boggarts, there is only one real rule: all new treasures and experiences must be shared. Those who hoard their gifts commit the one truly unforgivable sin.

name: Eyeblight's Ending
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Elf creature.
flavor_text:
"Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."
—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

name: Facevaulter
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Facevaulter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Boggarts get so excited when they find something new to smash that they really don't notice who gets underfoot.

name: Faerie Trickery
oracle_text: Counter target non-Faerie spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: The fae are so quick and their life spans so short that it's difficult to get retribution for their pranks.

name: Faultgrinder
oracle_text:
Trample
When Faultgrinder enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
Evoke {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Pretty, valuable, and delicious—a boggart thief's trifecta.

name: Fire-Belly Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{R}: Fire-Belly Changeling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text:
"My ears say it hisses. My fingers say it burns."
—Auntie Wort

name: Fistful of Force
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, that creature gets an additional +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Flamekin Brawler
oracle_text: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: When he hits people, they stay hit.

name: Footbottom Feast
oracle_text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The scent of rot and vinegar fills the marsh, inviting boggarts from every warren to reunite and feast.

name: Giant's Ire
oracle_text: Giant's Ire deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. If you control a Giant, draw a card.
flavor_text: The only feeling greater than hurling something a mile is crushing something else with it that was really, really irritating you.

name: Gilt-Leaf Ambush
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens. Clash with an opponent. If you win, those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Gilt-Leaf Seer
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: Desmera blinded her seers so that her beauty would be the last image burned in their memories. The act only deepened their insight.

name: Glimmerdust Nap
oracle_text:
Enchant tapped creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: The dreams of giants are as long as time and as deep as the earth. Thus they are prized by the dream-harvesting fae.

name: Goldmeadow Dodger
oracle_text: Goldmeadow Dodger can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "I've gotten close enough to a giant to smell his breath, but none has ever so much as spotted me. I wonder how long my record can extend?"

name: Goldmeadow Harrier
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text:
"It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

name: Heal the Scars
oracle_text: Regenerate target creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text: Elvish battle-magic has evolved two specialties: inflicting wounds that scar, and healing wounds without scarring. Politics determines the recipients of each.

name: Herbal Poultice
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice Herbal Poultice: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text:
"Apply orange leaf to a wound at dawn to clean it, at dusk to prevent the same injury from happening again."
—Kithkin superstition

name: Hillcomber Giant
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: The giants believe the fossils they find in Lorwyn's rocky heights are dreams frozen in time, and they treasure them.

name: Hornet Harasser
oracle_text: When Hornet Harasser dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"And though she didn't get her honey, Auntie found something far more interesting."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Hunt Down
oracle_text: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able.
flavor_text: "Springjacks and faeries can be difficult to hunt, but my favorite prey are the flamekin. They never fail to put up a worthy fight when cornered."

name: Hurly-Burly
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
• Hurly-Burly deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Things were popping like corn in a skillet. Olly landed in the pig pen with his prize sow on top of him, both squealin' like boggarts."
—Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

name: Ingot Chewer
oracle_text:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
flavor_text: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

name: Inkfathom Divers
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text:
"None appreciate sun and shallows like those who have seen the depths."
—Lianda of the Stonybrook school

name: Inner-Flame Acolyte
oracle_text:
When Inner-Flame Acolyte enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Judge of Currents
oracle_text: Whenever a Merfolk you control becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Though the currents of the Lanes shift every year, the merrow never lose track of where they are or where they are going.

name: Kinsbaile Balloonist
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Kinsbaile Balloonist attacks, you may have target creature gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Even when a giant's tantrum turns the sky into a chaotic gale, the path of the balloonist never falters.

name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
oracle_text: When Kinsbaile Skirmisher enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."

name: Kithkin Daggerdare
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The kith dance their elaborate reels not merely to celebrate the events of their lives but to form an unbreakable bond of loyalty with their kin, a bond stronger than the fear of death itself.

name: Kithkin Greatheart
oracle_text: As long as you control a Giant, Kithkin Greatheart gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
flavor_text: Sometimes a curious giant singles out a "little one" to follow for a few days, never realizing the effect it will have on the little one's life.

name: Kithkin Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: The empathetic nature of the thoughtweft allows kithkin healers to treat the cause of an illness rather than fight its symptoms.

name: Lace with Moonglove
oracle_text:
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy that creature.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Which is more filled with poison: the flower of the moonglove or the minds of elves?"
—Vessifrus, flamekin demagogue

name: Lairwatch Giant
oracle_text:
Lairwatch Giant can block an additional creature each combat.
Whenever Lairwatch Giant blocks two or more creatures, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: A giant can brood over a grudge for decades, and woe to those who interrupt him.

name: Lash Out
oracle_text: Lash Out deals 3 damage to target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, Lash Out deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Leaf Gilder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

name: Lignify
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a Treefolk with base power and toughness 0/4 and loses all abilities.
flavor_text: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his *feet* be so thirsty?

name: Lowland Oaf
oracle_text: {T}: Target Goblin creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: "I don't know why the little one was so mad. He said to put him down, and I put him down."

name: Lys Alana Huntmaster
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

name: Moonglove Extract
oracle_text: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

name: Moonglove Winnower
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Winnowers live to eliminate eyeblights, creatures the elves deem too ugly to exist.

name: Mournwhelk
oracle_text:
When Mournwhelk enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.
Evoke {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
flavor_text: It hoards Lorwyn's rare sorrows.

name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
oracle_text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

name: Mulldrifter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Nameless Inversion
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Target creature gets +3/-3 and loses all creature types until end of turn.
flavor_text: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.

name: Nath's Buffoon
oracle_text: Protection from Elves
flavor_text: Smik learned the elvish dance quickly enough. The most difficult, yet most important step was to stay out of Nath's sight until called to perform.

name: Nath's Elite
oracle_text:
All creatures able to block Nath's Elite do so.
When Nath's Elite enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Nath's Elite. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Neck Snap
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"We merrows need not be disadvantaged when fighting on land. We lack the vulnerability of those who breathe only through their throats."
—Minnarin, merrow reejerey

name: Needle Drop
oracle_text:
Needle Drop deals 1 damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"First it was plovers and mulldrifters. Now it's knitting needles the size of javelins."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

name: Nightshade Stinger
oracle_text:
Flying
Nightshade Stinger can't block.
flavor_text:
"Most faeries are harmless pranksters. Every now and again, though, you get one that crosses over from mischievous to malicious."
—Gaddock Teeg

name: Oaken Brawler
oracle_text: When Oaken Brawler enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Oaken Brawler. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Oakgnarl Warrior
oracle_text: Vigilance, trample
flavor_text: "Roam as you will, your roots remain in the strong earth of your Rising."

name: Oblivion Ring
oracle_text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: A circle of sugar and a word of forbiddance.

name: Paperfin Rascal
oracle_text: When Paperfin Rascal enters the battlefield, clash with an opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Paperfin Rascal. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Peppersmoke
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If you control a Faerie, draw a card.
flavor_text: Like being trapped in a perpetual sneeze, faerie-dust poisoning is both exhilarating and agonizing.

name: Pestermite
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Pestermite enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor_text: The fae know when they're not wanted. That's precisely why they show up.

name: Plover Knights
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text: The knights are a major attraction at every Lammastide festival. Teams of riders perform daring feats of flight to the delight of all below.

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "We see the same sky as you, just through a different lens."

name: Protective Bubble
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: Skilled merrow rudders ensure their charges arrive on time and without incident.

name: Quill-Slinger Boggart
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a Kithkin spell, you may have target player lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"A good day in Goldmeadow is one in which I don't spend all evening picking quills out of my backside."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

name: Ringskipper
oracle_text:
Flying
When Ringskipper dies, clash with an opponent. If you win, return Ringskipper to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Rootgrapple
oracle_text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. If you control a Treefolk, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"All the sylvan secrets of this world are etched between my rings. The skinfolk's metal aberrations can rot between my roots."
—Colfenor, the Last Yew

name: Runed Stalactite
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and is every creature type.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: When a changeling adopts a form no other changeling has taken, a rune appears in the caverns of Velis Vel to mark the event.

name: Scarred Vinebreeder
oracle_text: {2}{B}, Exile an Elf card from your graveyard: Scarred Vinebreeder gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: For disfigured elves, there are few choices beyond death or nettlevine.

name: Sentinels of Glen Elendra
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text: Some say the valley of Glen Elendra is mythical, and that rumors of its existence are nothing but a faerie prank. Others say it is the fae's most fiercely guarded secret.

name: Shields of Velis Vel
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Creatures target player controls get +0/+1 and gain all creature types until end of turn.
flavor_text: Changelings can alter shape based on what the beings around them desire most.

name: Shimmering Grotto
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Once each year, the sun's rays reach the hidden chamber of Velis Vel, and the changelings congregate from afar to bathe in the ever-shifting light.

name: Silvergill Douser
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Merfolk and/or Faeries you control.
flavor_text: The Silvergill school monitors traffic on the Lanes, ensuring that the riffraff don't interfere with travelers.

name: Skeletal Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Skeletal Changeling.
flavor_text: Though they lack true flesh and bone of their own, changelings imitate either with equal ease.

name: Smokebraider
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
flavor_text: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

name: Soaring Hope
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Soaring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature has flying.
{W}: Put Soaring Hope on top of its owner's library.

name: Soulbright Flamekin
oracle_text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

name: Spellstutter Sprite
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with mana value X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

name: Spiderwig Boggart
oracle_text: When Spiderwig Boggart enters the battlefield, target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: Auntie Flint was the first to pioneer the spiderwig, a mass of arachnids intended to be worn rather than eaten.

name: Spring Cleaning
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment. Clash with an opponent. If you win, destroy all enchantments your opponents control. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Springjack Knight
oracle_text: Whenever Springjack Knight attacks, clash with an opponent. If you win, target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Springleaf Drum
oracle_text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: After trying mudskippers for an afternoon, Scratch decided that crickcarp made the best noise.

name: Stinkdrinker Daredevil
oracle_text: Giant spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: Boggarts constantly strive to outdo each other with the things they bring back to the warren, each hoping the exploit will become as well-known as those of Auntie Grub.

name: Stonybrook Angler
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text: "Water is in the air, the trees, and the earth. Understand its motion, speak its language, and the subtle currents that flow through all living things will fall under your command."

name: Streambed Aquitects
oracle_text:
{T}: Target Merfolk creature gets +1/+1 and gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We look in the river and see scattered stones. A merrow looks and sees a map of Lorwyn."
—Illulia, flamekin soulstoke

name: Surge of Thoughtweft
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a Kithkin, draw a card.
flavor_text: Kithkin weave together their very thoughts, creating a depth of cooperation unknown to other races.

name: Tarfire
oracle_text: Tarfire deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

name: Thieving Sprite
oracle_text:
Flying
When Thieving Sprite enters the battlefield, target player reveals X cards from their hand, where X is the number of Faeries you control. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.

name: Tideshaper Mystic
oracle_text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.
flavor_text: He paints with drop and shimmer a world that exists only in the wistful heart.

name: Triclopean Sight
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Triclopean Sight enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

name: Wanderer's Twig
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Wanderer's Twig: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: For every tree who falls, there are countless sprouts waiting to rise.

name: Warren Pilferers
oracle_text: When Warren Pilferers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card is a Goblin card, Warren Pilferers gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "What do they need all this stuff for? They're dead. We're alive. Simple enough."

name: Warren-Scourge Elf
oracle_text: Protection from Goblins
flavor_text:
"If one can associate any virtue with the eyeblights, it is the talent some achieve in disposing of them. I have seen the slaying of boggarts raised nearly to an art form."
—Fiala, Gilt-Leaf winnower

name: Weed Strangle
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Clash with an opponent. If you win, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Wellgabber Apothecary
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target tapped Merfolk or Kithkin creature this turn.
flavor_text: "You've discovered that boggarts bite, I see. And will the militia be chasing this lot? . . . Ah, you're staying in town to avoid Nath's hunt. Wise. Now this poultice . . ."

name: Whirlpool Whelm
oracle_text: Clash with an opponent, then return target creature to its owner's hand. If you win, you may put that creature on top of its owner's library instead. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

name: Wings of Velis Vel
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains all creature types, and gains flying.
flavor_text: Changeling magic grants unusual wishes.

name: Wispmare
oracle_text:
Flying
When Wispmare enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
Evoke {W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Woodland Changeling
oracle_text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
flavor_text: Changelings cannot resist the draw of a new shape, even if doing so would be in their best interests.

name: Zephyr Net
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and flying.
flavor_text: Faeries hang beings that interest them as ornaments in the sky, each clique competing to outshine the prize of the last.
